description: President Obama announced troop reductions that would end America’s longest war.
title: Video: Obama Says U.S. Attained Key Goals in Afghanistan
title_page: Video: Obama Says U.S. Attained Key Goals in Afghanistan - The New York Times
text:
The latest on President Obama, Congress and other political news from Washington -- and around the nation -- from the staff of The New York Times.
